name: Birb Protec
description:
Birb Protec

Birb Protec is arcade games taken to the next level. Become the birb and protec your nest from the monsters who want to take everything away from you. There is only one way to survive protec your own and be the best birb you can be.

How To Play:
  • Protec your nest from the owls.
  • Feed your hatchlings with the worms.
  • Survive.
